job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtoverviewampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgt kinotek is revolutionizing the movement industry by making cutting edge motion capture technology and data visualization techniques accessible to physical therapists chiropractors and their clinics traditionally these tools have only been available to professional sports teams and high end medical facilities kinotek is changing this by leveraging the power of the cloud and the latest advancements in computer vision technology to enhance treatment communication and patient outcomes at clinics of all sizesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt our first product uses the azure kinect a d lidar based camera to collect spatial data of an individuals movement our platform uses this data to compute quantitative metrics such as joint range of motion musculoskeletal asymmetries and postural assessments this information is visualized in a browserbased application that clinicians can review and analyze with their clients in the context of a single assessment or in terms of their broader treatment protocol when looking at how these metrics compare over time this provides a platform for the clinician to interact with their clients and share specific individualized information to build trust and understanding into the treatment processampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt kinotek is currently in beta with a cohort of providers across the united states using the platform in their clinics during this time we are working to enhance the product based on customer feedback while preparing the platform to scale into the market following product launchltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtyour roleltstronggtltpgtltpgt you will be working in a small driven team where the ability to be agile problem solve and learn quickly are a must given the relatively early stage of the company and the product you will play a large role in shaping the technical implementation of our products as a result there is a high degree of autonomy in the role but also a high level of responsibilityampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtyour responsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtltstronggtunderstand and contribute to the product from a full stack perspectiveltstronggt everyone on the team is given the opportunity and expected to learn all components of the software we strive to combat siloing as much as possible in the short term however this role will primarily be for a frontend engineerltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtltstronggtassist the team in developing a robust testing strategyltstronggt as our product matures from mvp to a scalable production application we are working to put procedures in place to catch errors before they are shipped do you have opinions on or experience with tools and techniques for implementing testing heres a chance to take ownership and help the team ensure that code can be shipped with peace of mindltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtltstronggtwork with the team to continuously improve our software release efficiency by implementing and enhancing cicdltstronggt we geek out for good cicd because it ultimately means better developer quality of life if you enjoy devops this is another area to take ownership and explore new technologiesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtltstronggtactively contribute to rampampd effortsltstronggt kinotek is very much in the early stages of product development that means that we are constantly vetting new technologies and developing innovative ways to accomplish our product goals we are looking for individuals who can leverage their curiosities passions and prior experiences to guide technology adoption and integrationltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtltstronggtshare knowledge in areas that the team may lack and actively learn from the team in areas that you may lackltstronggt skill enrichment is something that is emphasized by default in a startup environment but we lean into it as much as we canltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtrequirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtyou must have proficiency in at least of the below core technical skillsltligtltligtyou must have familiarity with at least of any of the skillsfields listed belowltligtltligtyou should have approximately or more years of professional experience in a similar or adjacent technical fieldltligtltligtthe ability to work in the office at least part time is preferredltligtltligtthis position is open to us workers including citizens permanent residence asylees and refugeesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtcore technical skillsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtc net core rest apisltligtltligtjavascript reactltligtltligtdatabases sql andor
